definition: to dash to pieces, or scatter
kjvTranslation: be beaten in sunder, break (in pieces), broken, dash (in pieces), cause to be discharged, dispersed, be overspread, scatter.

translations.bg: да се разбие на парчета или да се разпръсне
translations.da: at slå i stykker eller sprede
translations.el: να συντρίψω σε κομμάτια, ή να διασκορπίσω
translations.nb: å slå i stykker, eller spre
translations.ro: a face bucăți sau a împrăștia
translations.sv: att krossa i bitar eller sprida ut
